result.eng: They left the airplane and went inside the other one.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.eng: And if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ga: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.orig: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.orig: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.

result.eng: By 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ga: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit AontaitheBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ponchtml: Faoi 1865 ḃí úinéaraċt daoine in aġaiḋ an dlí in gaċ ceann de na Stáit AontaiṫeBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.

result.eng: Jamie was at the end of his seventh year of age.
result.ga: I gceann a sheacht mblian a bhí Séimí
result.orig: I gceann a sheacht mblian a bhí Séimí
result.html: I gceann a sheacht mblian a bhí SéimíJamie was at the end of his seventh year of age.
result.ponchtml: I gceann a ẛeaċt mblian a ḃí SéimíJamie was at the end of his seventh year of age.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: He wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ga: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.orig: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.html: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ċeann le tógáil aige as ólaċánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.html: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.

result.eng: The night is coming, where will I rest my head?
result.ga: Tá an oíche ag teacht agus cá leagfaidh mé mo cheann
result.orig: Tá an oíche ag teacht agus cá leagfaidh mé mo cheann
result.html: Tá an oíche ag teacht agus cá leagfaidh mé mo cheannThe night is coming, where will I rest my head?
result.ponchtml: Tá an oíċe ag teaċt agus cá leagfaiḋ mé mo ċeannThe night is coming, where will I rest my head?

result.eng: Where will I rest my head tonight?
result.ga: Cá háit a leagfaidh mé mo cheann go maidin
result.orig: Cá háit a leagfaidh mé mo cheann go maidin
result.html: Cá háit a leagfaidh mé mo cheann go maidinWhere will I rest my head tonight?
result.ponchtml: Cá háit a leagfaiḋ mé mo ċeann go maidinWhere will I rest my head tonight?

result.eng: He thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ga: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.orig: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.html: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithneHe thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis gur ċeart dó glór a ċinn a aiṫneHe thought he should recognize his voice.

result.eng: Each man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ga: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.orig: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.html: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ponchtml: D'ól 'aċ aon ḟear acu tarraingt a ċinn den ḃuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.html: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: Dar le Babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.

result.eng: The court decided that the act breached the constitution.
result.ga: Chinn an chúirt gur sháraigh an t-acht an bunreacht
result.orig: Chinn an chúirt gur sháraigh an t-acht an bunreacht
result.html: Chinn an chúirt gur sháraigh an t-acht an bunreachtThe court decided that the act breached the constitution.
result.ponchtml: Ċinn an ċúirt gur ẛáraiġ an t-aċt an bunreaċtThe court decided that the act breached the constitution.

result.eng: They tried promoting the use of Irish among young people.
result.ga: Rinne siad iarracht úsáid na Gaeilge a chur chun cinn i measc daoine óga
result.orig: Rinne siad iarracht úsáid na Gaeilge a chur chun cinn i measc daoine óga
result.html: Rinne siad iarracht úsáid na Gaeilge a chur chun cinn i measc daoine ógaThey tried promoting the use of Irish among young people.
result.ponchtml: Rinne siad iarraċt úsáid na Gaeilge a ċur ċun cinn i measc daoine ógaThey tried promoting the use of Irish among young people.
